summary: usain bolt will compete at the iaaf / btc world relays in the bahamas next month , the jamaica athletics administrative association has announced . the six - time olympic gold medallist will compete at the relay championship on may 2 and 3 as part of the jamaican team . usain bolt has confirmed he will be part of jamaica 's team at the world relays in the bahamas

usain bolt will compete at the iaaf / btc world relays in the bahamas next month , the jamaica athletics administrative association has announced . the six - time olympic gold medallist will compete at the relay championship on may 2 and 3 as part of the jamaican team . usain bolt has confirmed he will be part of jamaica 's team at the world relays in the bahamas

usain bolt will compete at the iaaf / btc world relays in the bahamas next month , the jamaica athletics administrative association has announced . the six - time olympic gold medallist will compete at the relay championship on may 2 and 3 as part of the jamaican team . usain bolt has confirmed he will be part of jamaica 's team at the world relays in the bahamas
aspect: 1. Usain Bolt, six-time Olympic gold medallist, will compete in the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas on May 2 and 3.
2. Bolt is excited to be part of the Jamaican team and has a strong track record in relays.
3. Jamaica Athletics Administrative Association General Secretary Garth Gayle expressed delight at Bolt's participation and anticipates "sprint magic" in the competition.
explain: Usain Bolt, a six-time Olympic gold medallist, will participate in the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas on May 2 and 3.
Bolt is enthusiastic about being associated with his native team Jamaica and has a remarkable history in relay events, indicating his dominant performance in this discipline.
Jamaica Athletics Administrative Association General Secretary Garth Gayle is excited about Usain Bolt's participation in the iaaf / btc world relays and anticipates thrilling sprint competition.
